ext_description.p: A Component_2d_embedded_location is a type of . The Component_2d_embedded_location places components in a substrate under the constraint that is is required to maintain contact with on both the top and bottom of the component.
ext_description.note: The referenced by the referenced by reference_terminal should be a constituent of one of the surfaces referenced by precedent_surface or subsequent_surface.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the text that provides further information about Component_2d_embedded_location.
specifies the that joins the of the component being located to the or that implements the internal connection to the circuitry in the rest of the substrate.

specifies the that joins the of the component being located to the associated stratum surface. The in this role is identifying the stratum surface that is further away from the primary stratum in the substrate than is the embedded component itself.

specifies the that joins the of the component being located to the associated stratum surface. The in this role is identifying the stratum surface that is closer to the primary stratum in the substrate than is the embedded component itself.
The precedent_surface and subsequent_surface shall not be the same surface.
The inherited from the shall be "False".
The combination of precedent_surface, reference_terminal, and subsequent_surface shall be unique within a population of Component_2d_embedded_location.

A Design_intent_modification_planar_shape is a type of . A Design_intent_modification_planar_shape is the representation of a by a .

A Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation is the representation of one or more as a . A Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation is parametric data provided to support an algorithm that calculates explicit geometry. Since the geometry may be discontiguous (fill may included dashed lines), more than one may be referenced by Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation as the resulting product data of the algorithm execution. The geometric data resulting from execution of the algorithm shall be included in if it is not desired to exchange the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation. Exchanging or sharing both the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation and the that result from execution of the algorithm may be appropriate. Therefore an optional attribute that specifies the planar shapes that are derived from the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation is to be included in an exchange if both the planar shape and the styled area representation is included. The units used in the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation shall be those specified in the global geometric context for the design as specified by . If the geometry is contiguous, there shall be only one referenced.
specifies a that represents the modification in the .
specifies the that is characterized by this Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation.

specifies the for the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation. There may be more than one for the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

A Continuous_assembly_component_2d_shape is a type of . A Continuous_assembly_component_2d_shape is one whose points form a connected domain, that is each point in the domain is reachable by traversing one or more other points in the domain.
specifies a role of the for the Continuous_assembly_component_2d_shape.

specifies a role of the for the Disconnected_area_component.
specifies a role of the for the Disconnected_area_component.

ext_description.p: A Discontinuous_assembly_component_2d_shape is a type of . A Discontinuous_assembly_component_2d_shape is one whose points do not form a connected domain. That is there may be one or more points in the domain that are not reachable from another point in the domain.
ext_description.example: a population of circular shaped Stratum_features (dots) formed in a stratum for the purposes of permitting fluid to flow around the dots forms a discontinous domain for the points that are within the dots.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies a role of the for the Discontinuous_assembly_component_2d_shape.
